scripts.docs.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && cp -r docs/src/fonts dist/ && ./scripts/ssg docs/src dist "Glom Documentation" "https://3mcd.github.io/glom" && bun run docs.build.examples && touch dist/.nojekyll
scripts.docs.build.examples: bun x preconstruct build && mkdir -p dist/examples && bun run docs.build.example.p2p && bun run docs.build.example.server
scripts.docs.build.example.p2p: cd app/p2p-canvas && bun x vite build --base ./ --outDir ../../dist/examples/p2p-canvas
scripts.docs.build.example.server: cd app/server-authoritative-canvas && bun x vite build --base ./ --outDir ../../dist/examples/server-authoritative-canvas
